hero.title: Empowering Morocco's Digital Future
hero.subtitle: From AI to hardware, Rkicy Technology delivers powerful, enterprise-grade IT solutions for modern businesses across Morocco and beyond.

overview.description1: Established in 2023, Rkicy Technology combines cutting-edge innovation with deep local market knowledge to deliver tailor-made IT solutions for Moroccan and North African businesses across various sectors.
overview.description2: We specialize in enterprise-grade technologies from AI to hardware, helping organizations of all sizes navigate their digital transformation journey with solutions that address specific regional challenges and opportunities.

values.description: At Rkicy Technology, we're guided by a set of core principles that shape our approach to business and technology. These values drive our decision-making process and reflect our commitment to excellence and client success.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Our team brings years of experience in IT solutions, AI development, and enterprise hardware, ensuring exceptional results for businesses across Morocco.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay at the cutting edge of technology to offer forward-thinking solutions that address our clients' current and future digital challenges.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We build lasting relationships with our clients, becoming a true extension of their team throughout their digital transformation journey.

timeline.description: Since our founding in 2023, we've been on a mission to transform the Moroccan technology landscape. Here are some key milestones from our journey so far.

founding.title: Foundation
founding.description: Rkicy Technology was established in Rabat with a vision to bring enterprise-grade IT solutions to the Moroccan market.

expansion.title: Team Expansion

award.title: Industry Recognition

growth.title: Strategic Growth
growth.description: Expanded service offerings and formed key partnerships with global technology leaders.

future.title: Looking to the Future
future.description: As we continue to grow, our mission remains the same: to empower Moroccan businesses with the technology and expertise they need to compete in the global digital economy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: At Rkicy Technology, we envision a Morocco where businesses of all sizes have access to world-class technology solutions that drive growth, innovation, and competitiveness on both regional and global stages. We believe in technology as an enabler of economic development and social progress.

items.first: Deliver solutions that address specific regional challenges while meeting global standards.
items.second: Ensure technology accessibility through competitive pricing and flexible deployment models.
items.third: Prioritize knowledge transfer to strengthen local digital capabilities.
items.fourth: Foster innovation that respects and enhances Morocco's unique business ecosystem.

methodology.quote: Technology is most powerful when it's designed around real human needs and local context. That's what drives our approach at Rkicy.

cropdoc.title: CropDoc
cropdoc.description: AI-powered crop disease detection app helping farmers in Morocco and Nigeria protect their fields and boost yields.
cropdoc.detailedDescription: CropDoc is an AI-driven mobile-first solution designed for farmers in Africa to detect crop diseases early and provide actionable treatments. By combining advanced image recognition, offline capability, and drone scanning services, CropDoc empowers farmers with instant diagnosis, step-by-step treatment plans, and localized recommendations in multiple languages. Trusted by thousands of farmers, CropDoc is transforming agriculture by reducing treatment costs, increasing yields, and preventing crop losses.

testimonial.quote: The app identified diseases before visible symptoms appeared, saving entire harvests.
testimonial.author: Ahmed Benali

challenges.1: Build an AI model that works offline for farmers in remote areas.
challenges.2: Design an intuitive mobile interface for low-tech users.
challenges.3: Ensure accuracy and speed in disease detection under diverse conditions.

solutions.1: Integrated a lightweight TensorFlow model optimized for offline performance.
solutions.2: Created a simple, localized UX with multilingual support (Arabic, French, English).
solutions.3: Trained AI on thousands of crop images for 98% detection accuracy.

outcomes.1: Over 15,000 farmers now use CropDoc to protect their crops.
outcomes.2: Average yield increased by 25%, treatment costs reduced by 30%.
outcomes.3: Expanded coverage from Nigeria to Morocco with future plans for wider Africa.

paycov.title: Paycov: Revolutionizing Payments in Morocco and Beyond
paycov.description: A universal, bank‑agnostic digital payment platform enabling instant, secure P2P and merchant transactions—built to bridge Morocco’s financial ecosystem and accelerate open banking adoption.
paycov.detailedDescription:
Executive Summary
Paycov is a Moroccan-born, globally-ready digital payment platform that delivers seamless, instant, and secure peer‑to‑peer (P2P) and merchant transactions. Operating as a unifying financial layer above traditional banking infrastructure, it connects users, institutions, and fintech innovation. Developed by Rkicy Technology, Paycov is engineered for effortless integration with all banks, simplifying daily payments and positioning Morocco for the open banking era.

Vision
Our mission is to modernize everyday payments for every Moroccan—hanout owners, street vendors, freelancers, retailers, and consumers alike. Aligned with national initiatives such as e-Dirham and the broader shift toward a cashless society, Paycov aspires to become the default application for sending, receiving, and managing money securely and transparently.

Key Features
• Universal interoperability: Link cards and accounts from any domestic or international bank.
• Instant payments: Real-time transfers via QR code, phone number, username, or NFC.
• Security & transparency: Bank-grade encryption, verified identities, multi-factor and biometric access.
• Multi-channel access: In-person (QR / NFC), remote (phone / username), and B2B/API integrations.

Use Cases
• Pay for groceries, taxis, restaurants, and neighborhood shops.
• Send money instantly to friends and family.
• Get paid as a freelancer or independent vendor.
• Automate B2B transactions through Paycov’s API.
• Bridge everyday use with emerging e-Dirham adoption.

Why Now
• Digital currency momentum (e-Dirham) requires intuitive user-facing rails.
• Financial inclusion: Empower unbanked and underbanked users with a portable financial identity.
• Behavioral shift: Younger generations demand speed, transparency, and control.

Technology Stack
• Backend: Node.js + PostgreSQL
• Mobile: React Native (iOS & Android)
• Security: End-to-end encryption, 2FA, biometric authentication
• Scalability: Architected for millions of daily transactions

Strategic Advantage
• Led by seasoned banking and fintech leaders (including former Bank Populaire leadership).
• Compliant with Moroccan regulations yet architected for international scale.
• Community-driven, transparent product evolution guided by real user feedback.

Roadmap
• 2025 Q1: Closed beta launch (Morocco)
• 2025 Q2: NFC rollout & open banking pilot
• 2025 Q3: Launch Paycov Business API
• 2026: Expansion into MENA & francophone Africa

Built by Rkicy Technology
Rkicy Technology is a Moroccan deeptech & fintech studio focused on building world-class financial infrastructure for the new African economy. Paycov is our flagship platform—an expression of our technical rigor, user-centric design, and commitment to meaningful impact.

Contact
Partnerships, investment, or media: hello@rkicy.com | rkicy.com | Founder (LinkedIn): Youssef Rkaissi

testimonial.quote: Paycov represents the financial layer Morocco has been missing—simple for users, robust for partners, and future-proof for open banking.
testimonial.author: Youssef Rkaissi

challenges.1: Fragmented payment ecosystem lacking universal interoperability across banks and channels.
challenges.2: High proportion of unbanked or underbanked users needing accessible digital financial identity.
challenges.3: Requirement for real-time, secure, regulation-ready infrastructure anticipating open banking.

solutions.1: Unified, bank-agnostic platform enabling instant transfers via QR, NFC, phone number, or username.
solutions.2: Bank-grade security stack: end-to-end encryption, verified identities, MFA, and biometric access.
solutions.3: Scalable, modular architecture with API-first design prepared for open banking and regional expansion.

outcomes.1: Seamless real-time P2P and merchant payments across multiple interaction channels.
outcomes.2: Lower barriers to digital financial participation for underserved demographics.
outcomes.3: Strategic positioning as a foundational layer for e-Dirham adoption and future open banking frameworks.

nounours.title: Nounours.ma: Premium Plush & Collectibles E‑Commerce
nounours.description: Modern Shopify-powered platform offering giant plush bears, breathing comfort companions, and designer collectible figurines—curated, gift-ready, and optimized for seamless checkout.
nounours.detailedDescription:
Overview
Nounours.ma is a Morocco-based e‑commerce platform specializing in premium plush toys, giant teddy bears, innovative calming plush (Masolu breathing series), and collectible & designer figurines. Built on Shopify, the store blends emotional gifting, product storytelling, and operational efficiency to deliver a delightful, trustworthy buying experience.

Product Lines
• Giant Plush (120–160 cm) – Signature teddy bears in multiple colors and sizes.
• Standard & Medium Plush – Accessible gift options for all occasions.
• Masolu Breathing Series – Calming, simulated respiration plush for comfort and relaxation.
• Licensed & Character Plush – Stitch, Hello Kitty, themed assortments.
• Collectible Figurines – Pop Mart series (Labubu, Crybaby, Coca-Cola editions) and blind box culture.

Customer Experience
• Clear categorization and seasonal promotions.
• High-quality product imagery with variant emphasis.
• Gift-centric positioning (romantic, comfort, celebration).
• Transparent discounting and promotional pricing.

Technology & Operations
• Shopify core: secure checkout, inventory management, extensible app ecosystem.
• Multiple payment methods (local + international readiness).
• Scalable catalog architecture for rapid line expansion.
• Mobile-first browsing and cart flow.

Market Position
Positioned as a curated destination at the intersection of emotional gifting, comfort wellness, and collectible culture. Differentiation arises from breadth (plush + designer figurines), innovation (Masolu breathing series), and trust signals (pricing clarity, contact visibility, local presence).

Promotions & Merchandising
• Tiered pricing with promotional markdowns (launch, seasonal, inventory rotation).
• Emphasis on scarcity and exclusivity for blind box figurines.
• Highlighted bestsellers and new arrivals to drive repeat engagement.

Brand & Community
Values: Joy, comfort, gifting connection, quality assurance. Community touchpoints via Instagram, newsletter, and storytelling around companionship & collection.

Contact & Support
Direct phone, email, and policy transparency (refund, privacy, shipping, terms) reinforce credibility and retention.

Strategic Foundation
Nounours.ma establishes a scalable base to layer future personalization, loyalty rewards, bundle logic, and regional expansion—while maintaining a high-trust, emotionally resonant brand narrative.

testimonial.quote: Nounours.ma delivers more than plush—it delivers curated moments of comfort, nostalgia, and collectible delight.
testimonial.author: Operations Lead

challenges.1: Balancing diverse product lines (plush, innovation, collectibles) without diluting user journey clarity.
challenges.2: Maintaining product quality perception and trust in a competitive, price-sensitive gifting market.
challenges.3: Optimizing checkout conversion while supporting multiple payment methods and promotional logic.

solutions.1: Structured catalog taxonomy with clear category segmentation and bestseller anchoring.
solutions.2: High-fidelity visuals, transparent pricing, and emphasis on material quality & comfort benefits.
solutions.3: Shopify-native optimizations: multi-payment integration, streamlined cart flow, scalable promo framework.

outcomes.1: Improved browsing clarity and cross-category discovery (plush to collectibles).
outcomes.2: Strengthened trust and perceived value through consistent branding and transparent policies.
outcomes.3: Conversion-ready foundation for future loyalty, personalization, and regional scale.

finish3.title: Finish3 — Your Daily 'Top 3' Task Mastery Tool
finish3.description: Finish3 is more than a productivity app—it’s your daily focus system. Designed to help you finish your top three tasks every day, it blends behavioral science, minimalism, and habit-building into one seamless experience.
finish3.detailedDescription:
Overview & Vision
Finish3 is a focused productivity tool engineered by Rkicy Technology to answer one simple question: 'What are the three tasks that will define your day?' By reducing choices to three, Finish3 eliminates overwhelm, fosters daily success, and reinforces intentional habit formation.

Core Features
• Elegant simplicity—Minimalist dashboard displaying only your top 3 tasks.
• Smart rollover—Unfinished tasks auto-carry to the next day.
• Daily reset—Fresh start every morning.
• Real-time sync across all devices.
• Insight-driven analytics—Completion streaks, success rates, and progress trends.
• Built-in reliability—Responsive UI and stable backend performance.

Pricing & Plans
• Free: $0 – Up to 50 tasks/month.
• Pro: $2.99/month – Unlimited tasks + full analytics.
• Teams (Coming Soon): Shared boards and advanced controls.

Technology & Roadmap
Stack: React, Node.js, Firebase.
Q3 2025: Team features.
Q4 2025: AI-based prioritization + calendar integrations.
2026: Offline mode + wearable support.

About Rkicy Technology
Founded in 2023 in Casablanca, Rkicy builds intelligent productivity software and enterprise solutions with an ethos of clarity, performance, and design excellence.

Competitive Position
Unlike bloated tools like ClickUp or Notion, Finish3 is deliberately minimal, leveraging behavioral design to ensure engagement and consistent results.

Key Value Proposition
Finish3 helps you finish—not just plan—your day’s most important work, one day at a time.

challenges.1: Users face decision fatigue and overwhelm from endless task lists, reducing execution quality.
challenges.2: Difficulty forming a sustainable daily productivity habit with existing complex tools.
challenges.3: Current apps lack behavioral reinforcement and analytics for real progress tracking.

solutions.1: Enforced the 'Top 3' principle with a clean, distraction-free UI.
solutions.2: Integrated automatic daily reset with smart rollover and real-time multi-device sync.
solutions.3: Added analytics, streak tracking, and future AI-driven prioritization for adaptive focus.

outcomes.1: Improved daily completion rates through intentional constraint.
outcomes.2: Users build a repeatable focus habit supported by rollover and reset mechanics.
outcomes.3: Finish3 positions as a minimal yet powerful alternative to complex productivity suites.

ufcCountdown.title: UFCCountdown.com
ufcCountdown.description: A real-time countdown and event tracker for UFC fans worldwide, designed for speed, simplicity, and engagement.
ufcCountdown.detailedDescription: At RKICY, we move fast to turn ideas into impactful digital products. UFCCountdown.com exemplifies this principle. It’s a platform built for MMA enthusiasts to track upcoming UFC events, fight schedules, and live countdowns. With a clean design, real-time updates, and an app-like experience, we created a reliable and engaging destination for fans globally. From concept to launch, our team delivered with speed and precision, proving our ability to execute without compromising quality.

testimonial.quote: The RKICY team delivered UFCCountdown.com with incredible speed and flawless execution.
testimonial.author: Product Owner

challenges.1: Provide real-time UFC event data with zero delays.
challenges.2: Create a responsive, app-like experience for both mobile and desktop users.
challenges.3: Deliver the platform within a very short timeline without compromising quality.

solutions.1: Integrated live APIs for instant event updates and countdown synchronization.
solutions.2: Designed a clean, mobile-first UI with optimized performance.
solutions.3: Executed an agile development cycle for rapid launch and iteration.

outcomes.1: Fans now have a single destination for real-time UFC schedules and countdowns.
outcomes.2: Increased engagement and return visits due to intuitive UX.
outcomes.3: Delivered a global-ready platform in record time, showcasing RKICY's agility.

requirements.title: Requirements Gathering
requirements.description: We begin by thoroughly understanding your business needs, target audience, and project goals. This discovery phase involves stakeholder interviews, market research, and competitive analysis to establish a solid foundation for the project.
requirements.deliverable: Comprehensive requirements document, project scope, and initial timeline estimation.

planning.title: Strategic Planning
planning.description: With clear requirements in place, we develop a strategic plan that outlines the project roadmap, technology stack, resource allocation, and risk mitigation strategies to ensure smooth execution throughout the development lifecycle.
planning.deliverable: Detailed project plan, sprint schedule, and technical architecture documentation.

design.title: UX/UI Design
design.description: Our design team creates intuitive user experiences and visually appealing interfaces that align with your brand identity. We employ user-centered design principles and iterative processes to refine the design based on feedback.
design.deliverable: Wireframes, interactive prototypes, and finalized UI design assets ready for development.

development.title: Development & Integration
development.description: Our engineers build your solution using modern development practices, writing clean, maintainable code. We employ agile methodologies with regular sprints, continuous integration, and thorough code reviews to ensure quality.
development.deliverable: Functional application components, API integrations, and incremental builds for review.

launch.title: Testing & Deployment
launch.description: We conduct comprehensive testing across multiple devices and platforms to identify and resolve any issues. Once approved, we handle the deployment process with careful attention to minimize disruption and ensure a smooth transition.
launch.deliverable: Fully tested application, deployment documentation, and knowledge transfer materials.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Our relationship doesn't end at launch. We provide ongoing technical support, regular maintenance, and continuous monitoring to ensure your solution remains secure, performant, and aligned with your evolving business needs.
support.deliverable: Regular updates, performance reports, and proactive recommendations for improvements.

process.note: Each project is unique, and we tailor our process to meet your specific requirements while maintaining our commitment to quality and timely delivery.

q1.question: What is your typical response time?
q1.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, we recommend including "URGENT" in your subject line or using our priority support channels.

q2.question: Do you offer services outside of Morocco?
q2.answer: Yes, while we're headquartered in Morocco, we serve clients throughout North Africa and can provide remote consulting and implementation services globally for select projects.

q3.question: How can I request a quote?
q3.answer: You can request a quote by filling out our contact form with details about your project requirements, using our dedicated quote request form, or by calling us directly for immediate assistance.

q4.question: Do you offer maintenance services?
q4.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing maintenance and support for all our solutions. We offer various service level agreements (SLAs) to meet your specific needs, from basic support to 24/7 premium assistance.

zebra.longDescription: As an official partner of Zebra Technologies, we provide cutting-edge enterprise hardware solutions that help businesses optimize their operations, improve efficiency, and deliver exceptional customer experiences. Our certification ensures you receive genuine products with full warranty and support.

openai.title: OpenAI Solutions Provider
openai.description: Implementing advanced AI solutions to transform businesses through automation, data analysis, and intelligent workflows.

sap.title: SAP Consulting Partner
sap.description: Expert implementation and support for SAP solutions, helping businesses streamline operations and achieve digital transformation.

projects.description: We've helped businesses across Morocco transform their operations with custom digital solutions. Here are some of our featured projects.

paycov.description: A Moroccan digital payment platform, delivering instant, secure, and interoperable transactions for individuals and businesses.

finish3.description: A minimalist task management app helping users complete their 3 daily priorities with a clean design and seamless sync.

ufcCountdown.description: A dynamic UFC fight countdown platform providing real-time event tracking, fighter details, and engaging pre-fight content.

nounours.description: A modern e-commerce store for premium plush toys and figurines, delivering a smooth shopping experience and efficient catalog management.

testimonials.label: Client Stories
testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how our solutions have transformed businesses across Morocco

quotes.mohammed: We were worried that switching to a new ERP would paralyze our operations for weeks. The Rkicy team planned the process down to the last detail: zero downtime, clear training, and regular follow-up. Three months later, our billing cycles dropped from 10 days to 6.
quotes.leila: Before Rkicy, we did manual stock counts at the end of each month, and discrepancies were common. With their Zebra solutions, inventory is now real-time. In six months, we cut stock errors by 15% and saved the equivalent of one full-time position.
quotes.omar: Our old site would crash every sales season. Rkicy rebuilt our platform with a system that can handle five times more simultaneous connections. Result: zero downtime during winter sales and +38% online revenue.
quotes.amina: Before, we spent hours compiling Excel files for our meetings. With the BI dashboards created by Rkicy, all data is centralized and updated automatically. We cut our weekly management meetings from 2h30 to under an hour.
quotes.karim: We thought AI would take months to develop. Rkicy delivered an operational predictive model in 5 weeks, able to forecast our raw material needs. We’ve already avoided two critical stock shortages.

preview.title: Ready to
preview.subtitle: Let's discuss how Rkicy Technology can help your organization thrive in the digital age

company.description: Leading Morocco's digital transformation with enterprise-grade IT solutions, from AI to hardware. Empowering businesses across Morocco and beyond.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Rkicy Technology. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Rkicy Technology's website, products, or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.content: Rkicy Technology provides various IT solutions including AI, web development, SAP consulting, and hardware solutions. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our services at any time.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is the property of Rkicy Technology and is protected by international copyright laws.

limitation.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Rkicy Technology shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services.

governing.title: 5. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of Morocco without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Rkicy Technology collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our website or services.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and company information when you interact with our website or services.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our business and deliver services to you.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal information.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Rkicy Technology uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

what.title: 1. What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the website owners.

types.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use essential cookies necessary for the website to function, performance cookies to analyze site usage, and marketing cookies to track visitors across websites.

control.title: 3. How to Control Cookies
control.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can delete existing cookies, allow or block all cookies, or block cookies from particular websites.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Our website may use third-party services that set their own cookies, such as Google Analytics or social media sharing buttons.

updates.title: 5. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, regulation, or our business practices.

overview.title: We Respect Your Privacy
overview.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. We also share information about your site usage with our social media, advertising, and analytics partners.
overview.essentialNote: Essential cookies are always active as they are necessary for the website to function.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site, measure performance, and improve the user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant advertisements on other websites and to measure the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns.
